bug.author: rkooo567
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
When running test_actor_restart locally, it succeeds, but it shows the error that does not appear when GCS Actor management is off. We should at least figure out why this error occurs. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18510752/86851647-2bab4d80-c068-11ea-8a71-e845152647cc.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): Run test_actor_restart.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
